pullRequest.title: Remove some unused TimeFieldSpec related methods from Schema
pullRequest.bodyText:
Another step towards: #2756
As I was making changes to Schema to treat TIME as DATE_TIME, found a subset of changes that can go prior to the bigger change.
Removing 3 methods from the Schema which are related to TimeFieldSpec

getIncomingTimeUnit - was unused
getOutgoingTimeUnit - was unused
getTimeColumnName - was able to remove the 4 usages

commit.message: Remove some unused TimeFieldSpec related methods from Schema
Take time from table instead of reading all columns from schema, to preserve order, which is used in record reader

nodes.bodyText: can u add a comment here that we intentionally fall through to next? thanks
